recommendations: James Tan ‚ÄúMax is a seasoned recruiter with good knowledge and expertise within financial industry. A committed and self-motivated individual, he always gives in his best at work. Alan Main ‚ÄúI had the pleasure of working with Max for several years as one of our founding members of the Reed banking team, his dedication, strong work ethic and understanding of the banking sector was unquestionable and without doubt a key driving factor to his success during his time at Reed. He was a pleasure to manage and a great person to work with as his coach and mentor. Highly recommended.‚Äù
